section.para: Here are a few of my projects that I've worked on during my years here at Alfred State. Take a look
In this project i build a portfolio website that have background information about my skills, my experience and how to reach me i lean a lot bilding this site about Authantication.

This site was a summer activity website where i have a lot summer activity and i also have jokes on this site in this site i have the opertunity to demontrate my skill with xml i learn a lot about xml building this site it was a great apportunity.

This site was made when hotdog weekend was aproching i build it so that people can go and see the activities that accurd during hotdog weekend. This website was design to help student that does go here and also people that don'd go here to now every event going on.
